summary: A cattle herder and his family who reside in the dunes of Timbuktu find their quiet lives -- which are typically free of the Jihadists determined to control their faith -- abruptly disturbed.
cast: Ibrahim Ahmed|Abel Jafri|Toulou Kiki|Layla Walet Mohamed|Mehdi A.G. Mohamed|Hichem Yacoubi|Kettly Noël|Fatoumata Diawara|Adel Mahmoud Cherif|Salem Dendou|Mamby Kamissoko|Yoro Diakité|Cheik A.G. Emakni|Zikra Oualet Moussa|Weli Kleïb|Djié Sidi|Damien Ndjie
title: Timbuktu
